OCD.name: Bipartite Network Graph
OCD.description: Takes tabular data and generates a PostScript for a Bipartite Network Graph.

AD.name: Subtitle
AD.description: The subtitle text printed below the title of the visualization. Only available for non-simplified layout.

AD.name: Left side node type
AD.description: Values taken from the 'bipartitetype' column, which one should be on the left

AD.name: Node size
AD.description: The column to use to calculate the node size

AD.name: Left side node ordering
AD.description: The order in which to place nodes on the left side

AD.name: Right side node ordering
AD.description: The order in which to place nodes on the right side

AD.name: Edge weight
AD.description: The column to use to calculate the edge weight

AD.name: Title for left column (blank for default)
AD.description: The text to place above the left-hand column of nodes. The default is to use the value of the 'bipartitetype' column.

AD.name: Title for right column (blank for default)
AD.description: The text to place above the right-hand column of nodes The default is to use the value of the 'bipartitetype' column.

AD.name: Simplified Layout?
AD.description: If selected, a simplified graphic will be produced. If not selected, the graphic produced will be suitable for printing and include a title, date, howto, etc.
